div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 182 Therianos, W of Patras, Achaea, 1930 (1104) Burial: after 265 B.C. (Varoucha); c. 220 (Picard) Contents: 55 AR. Pot hoard Pharsalus: 1 triob. Phocis: 2 triob. Carystus: 1 dr. Chalcis: 13 dr. Histiaea: 2 tetrob. Corinth: 1 dr.; 1 triob. Sicyon: 31 triob. Argos: 3 triob. Disposition: Athens Varoucha, A Delt 1931-2, pp. 71-7, illus.
